gw.api.contact

Interface AutocompleteHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAutoCompleteHandler, AddressAutocompleteHandler, ContactEmailAutocompleteHandler, QuickJumpHandler, ZoneAutocompleteHandler

    public interface AutocompleteHandler
    Author:
    kprevas

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int SUGGESTION_LIMIT 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCaretPosition()
      Getter for the caret position.
      AutocompleteResult[] getSuggestions(java.lang.String textSoFar, int caretPos, java.lang.Object... additionalArgs)
      Gets the auto-complete results
      boolean moreResultsExist()
      Returns true if the last call to getSuggestions(String, int, Object[]) did not return all of the possible suggestions (e.g. due to the suggestion limit).

      boolean waitForKeypress()
      Returns true if the autocomplete should wait for a user key press before fetching suggestions.

    • Field Detail

      • SUGGESTION_LIMIT

        static final int SUGGESTION_LIMIT

    • Method Detail

      • getSuggestions

        AutocompleteResult[] getSuggestions(java.lang.String textSoFar,
                                    int caretPos,
                                    java.lang.Object... additionalArgs)
        Gets the auto-complete results
        Parameters:
        textSoFar - text entered to this auto-complete widget so far.
        caretPos - location of caret within text box. A value of -1 for this parameter indicates an unknown caret position.
        additionalArgs - additionalArgs requested by the PCF configuration of this widget
        Returns:
        an array of results, never null

      • moreResultsExist

        boolean moreResultsExist()
        Returns true if the last call to getSuggestions(String, int, Object[]) did not return all of the possible suggestions (e.g. due to the suggestion limit).

      • waitForKeypress

        boolean waitForKeypress()
        Returns true if the autocomplete should wait for a user key press before fetching suggestions. This can have big performance implications, so it should only return false if there are a small, fixed number of possible suggestions.

      • setCaretPosition

        void setCaretPosition(int caretPosition)
        Set the location of caret. This function will be called when autoComplete field loses the focus or when user selects a suggestion from the dropdown list.
        Parameters:
        caretPosition - location of caret within autoComplete text box.
        Since:
        9.0.0

      • getCaretPosition

        int getCaretPosition()
        Getter for the caret position.
        Returns:
        the caret position
        Since:
        9.0.0
